name: MultiLAN Zombie Survival
description:
This is a zombie survival game for windows.In this game you need to survive from zombies using some weapons and basic needs.
Features of the game:
-Day and night cycle
-multuplayer lan
-many kinds of weapons
-3 typs of zombie
-3 maps
-driving cars
-cutting trees
-crafting house and weapons
-different types of character
-team death match(multiplayer only)
